description: Try our easy to follow Brussels Sprouts With Hazelnuts & Sage recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Brussels Sprouts With Hazelnuts & Sage Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return pan to cooktop over high heat. Add Brussels sprouts and cook for 4 minutes, tossing regularly, or until golden and slightly charred. Transfer to a serving platter and top with sage, hazelnuts and crumbled cheese.
